chapter.p: Wrapper for Win32 API FindFirstFile()/FindNextFile() functions. Special entries . and .. are newer included in the resulting set.

synopsis.p: Calls FindFirstFile(). Returns false if no files found. Throws on other errors.
Calls FindNextFile(). Returns false if no more files available. Throws on other errors.
Closes the find handle. Throws on errors.
Same as Close() but returns false instead of throwing exceptions.
